mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase_edu( pay_no , purchase_user_no , purchase_edu_no , pay_state , pay_date , purchase_uid, purchase_aca_code ) VALUES( seq_purchase_edu_pay_no.nextval, ${buyer.userNo}, ${purchaseEdu.eduNo}, '${payState}', SYSDATE, '${purchaseUid}', '${purchaseAcademy.academyCode}' )
mapper.select: SELECT purchase_uid, purchase_user_no, purchase_edu_no, pay_date, pay_state, pay_no, purchase_aca_code FROM purchase_edu WHERE purchase_uid = '${value}'

SELECT distinct * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT pc.purchase_aca_code, u.user_no, e.edu_no , a.academy_name , e.edu_name , e.edu_start_date , e.edu_price , pc.pay_date , e.edu_state , pc.pay_state FROM edu e, academy a, users u, purchase_edu pc WHERE pc.purchase_user_no = u.user_no AND e.edu_academy_code = a.academy_code AND purchase_edu_no = e.edu_no ORDER BY edu_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT distinct * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT e.edu_no , e.edu_name , u.name , u.phone , pc.pay_date , e.edu_price , pc.pay_state FROM edu e, academy a, users u, purchase_edu pc WHERE pc.purchase_user_no = u.user_no AND pc.purchase_aca_code = #{searchAcademyCode} AND e.edu_academy_code = a.academy_code AND purchase_edu_no = e.edu_no ORDER BY edu_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
